```{r p_value with moving X,echo = F,comment = NA}
n = 10
mu = 0 
sd = 1
saveGIF_simple(for (moving_x in seq(-3,3,0.2)) { # mu = 0, sigma = 1, n = 100
  # Initialized data to construct the distribution 
  # Construct a standard normal distribution 
  x = seq(-3,3,0.1)
  y = dnorm(x,mean = mu,sd = sd)
  plot2_data_in_loop = as.data.frame(cbind(x, y))
  
  # Created data to fill the area with critical value 
  x_crtical_value = seq(1.96,3,0.01)
  y_critical_value = dnorm(x_crtical_value,mean = mu, sd = sd)
  critical_value_data = as.data.frame(cbind(x_crtical_value,y_critical_value))
  
  # Caculated z_score & p_value 
  p_value = round_simple(pnorm(-abs(moving_x)),4)
  z_score = (moving_x - mu)/(sd/sqrt(n))
  text_p_value = glue('p = {p_value}')
  text_Z_score = paste('$\\Z =  \\frac{',round_simple(moving_x,2),' -  0}{1/\\sqrt{',n,'}}$ = ', round_simple(z_score,2))
  
  # Created plot 
  if (moving_x < 1.9) {
  plot_ = plot2_data_in_loop %>% 
    ggplot(data =.,aes(x = x,y = y)) + 
    geom_line() + 
    geom_line(data = data.frame(x = c(moving_x,moving_x), y = c(0,0.4)),color = 'blue') +
    labs(title = 'Relationship Between Z score & Sample Mean Distribution',
         subtitle = 'Changing X',
         y = 'Frequency') + 
    theme_classic() + 
    
    annotate(geom = 'text',x = -2.5, y = 0.45, label = TeX(text_Z_score)) + 
    annotate(geom = 'text',x = -1, y = 0.45, label = text_p_value) + 
    lims(y = c(0,0.5))} 
  else {plot_ = plot2_data_in_loop %>% 
    ggplot(data =.,aes(x = x,y = y)) + 
    geom_line() + 
    geom_line(data = data.frame(x = c(moving_x,moving_x), y = c(0,0.4)),color = 'blue') +
    labs(title = 'Relationship Between Z score & Sample Mean Distribution',
         subtitle = 'Changing X',
         y = 'Frequency') + 
    theme_classic() + 
    
    annotate(geom = 'text',x = -2.5, y = 0.45, label = TeX(text_Z_score)) + 
    annotate(geom = 'text',x = -1, y = 0.45, label = text_p_value) + 
    lims(y = c(0,0.5)) +
    # Added critical line: used 1.96 as X since this is a standard normal distribution
    geom_line(data = data.frame(x = 1.96, y = c(0,0.06)),color = 'black') + 
    geom_area(data = critical_value_data, aes(x = x_crtical_value, y = y_critical_value),fill = 'red')}
    print(plot(plot_))},
  movie_name = 'Plot7_moving_X.gif', 
  clone_repository_path = clone_repository_path,
  loop_speed = 0.4, loop_number = 1)
```

```{r p_value with changing sd,echo = F,comment = NA}
fix_X = 1.5
mu = 0
n = 10
saveGIF_simple(loop_object = for (sd in seq(1,5,0.2)) {
  x = seq(-7,7,0.1)
  y = dnorm(x,mean = 0,sd = sd)
  plot2_data_in_loop = as.data.frame(cbind(x, y))
  z_score = (fix_X - mu)/(sd/sqrt(n))
  text_p_value = paste('p = ', round_simple(pnorm(-abs(fix_X),sd = sd),4))
  text_Z_score = paste('$\\Z =  \\frac{',round_simple(fix_X,2),' -  0}{',sd,'/\\sqrt{',n,'}}$ = ',round_simple(fix_X/sd,2))
  P_Value_text = paste('p = ', p_value)
  plot_ = plot2_data_in_loop %>% 
    ggplot(data =.,aes(x = x,y = y)) + 
    geom_line() + 
    geom_line(data = data.frame(x = c(fix_X,fix_X), y = c(0,0.4)),color = 'blue') + 
    labs(title = 'Relationship Between Z score & Sample Mean Distribution',
         subtitle = TeX(paste0('Changing $\\sigma$')),
         y = 'Frequency') + 
    theme_classic() + 
    
    #delete the comment to show z_score text
    #annotate(geom = 'text',x = -5.5, y = 0.45, label = TeX(text_Z_score)) + 
    annotate(geom = 'text',x = -5.5, y = 0.45, label = text_p_value) + 
    lims(y = c(0,0.5))
      
  print(plot(plot_))},
  movie_name = 'Plot6_moving_sd_with_p_value.gif', 
  clone_repository_path = clone_repository_path,
  loop_speed = 0.4, loop_number = 1)
```
